btw. here appears to be ontopic biblical verses https://bible.knowing-jesus.com/topics/End-Times-Prophecy

yes, the user quota limits on hubs and inability to switch hubs is what i think (as a mere user) is one of the biggest problem that i found on ZeroMe. Also the question on how/if/when user can reach all ther users posts is something i am uncertain about. Chat and private messages between users is also what i am missing there. Another important thing is ability to filter posts which majority is not in english, there already is a non merged pull request on zerome github.
